data.title: Get Pricing And Availability
data.meta_description: Booking Hulk Hogan is simple with Gotham Artists. No more hurdles, just straightforward answers from our friendly team. Book Today.
data.text:
Hilary Duff

Actress, Singer, & Author | Advocate for Women's Empowerment & Mental Health | Star of Disney's "Lizzie McGuire" | Multi-Platinum Recording Artist

Duff became a teen idol when she starred in the #1 hit Disney Channel series Lizzie McGuire. She has also starred in the movies The Lizzie McGuire Movie, Agent Cody Banks, Cheaper by the Dozen, A Cinderella Story, Raise Your Voice, The Perfect Man and Cheaper by the Dozen 2. Additionally, Duff stormed the music charts, with singles "So Yesterday" and "Come Clean" settling nicely into the top 40. She Currently stars as Kelsey Peters in Younger.

Aisha Harris

Co-Host of NPR's Pop Culture Happy Hour & Author of "Wannabe"

Aisha Harris is a co-host and reporter for the NPR podcast Pop Culture Happy Hour. She previously covered the arts as a critic, editor, and podcaster for The New York Times and Slate Magazine. Her subjects have included film and TV criticism, artist interviews, and cultural reporting/essays, and she has appeared on numerous radio and TV programs as a cultural commentator. She earned her bachelor's degree in theatre from Northwestern University and her master's degree in cinema studies from New York University. Aisha is the author of the essay collection "Wannabe: Reckonings with the Pop Culture That Shapes Me".

Sean Astin

Award-Winning Actor, Director, Producer & Mental Health Advocate

Sean Astin is an award-winning actor, screenwriter, and director known for his roles in Lord of the Rings, Rudy, The Goonies, Stranger Things, and more. In addition to his storied film career, Sean has been an advocate for mental health throughout his life, speaking to organizations all over the world to promote wellness and help remove the stigma around seeking mental health care.

Vanilla Ice

Reality TV Star | Real Estate Entrepreneur | Host of "The Vanilla Ice Project" | Influential Figure in Pop Culture & Business

Vanilla Ice, born Robert Matthew Van Winkle, is a multifaceted entertainer known for his hit single "Ice Ice Baby." Beyond music, he has made a name for himself as a reality TV star with his show "The Vanilla Ice Project," which focuses on home renovation and real estate. He is also a successful entrepreneur and sought-after keynote speaker, discussing topics ranging from pop culture to business innovation.

Jim Abbott

Former Professional Baseball Player, New York Yankees

Jim Abbott was born without a right hand. He was an All-America hurler at Michigan; won the Sullivan Award in 1987; was the pitcher for the Gold Medal Olympic Team in 1988; and threw a 4-0 no-hitter for the New York Yankees versus Cleveland.

Daymond John

CEO and Founder of FUBU | Star of ABC's Shark Tank | Presidential Ambassador for Global Entrepreneurship | Expert in Branding & Entrepreneurship

From humble beginnings to a self-made multimillionaire with over $6 billion to date in global product sales and a starring role on ABC’s business reality TV show, Shark Tank. As "The People's Shark", Daymond continues to set standards of excellence while expanding his interests in fashion, branding, marketing, consulting, entertainment, and beyond. Virtual Programs Now Available

Mel Robbins

Most Booked Female Speaker in the World, Motivational Speaker, Talk Show Host, Best-Selling Author, Social Media Influencer

Mel Robbins is one of the leading voices in personal development and transformation and an international bestselling author. Her work includes the global phenomenon The 5 Second Rule, four #1 bestselling audiobooks, the #1 podcast on Audible, as well as signature online courses that have changed the lives of more than half a million students worldwide. Her latest book, The High 5 Habit, was an instant best-seller.

Mark Schulman

World Renowned Drummer for bands: P!NK, Cher, Velvet Revolver, Author, & Keynote Speaker

A legend in the music world and most recently on tour with P!NK, Mark Schulman is an incredible musician, dynamic performer and a strategic business mind who has parlayed his success on stage into true business success. Unlocking strategies to help audiences Hack the Rockstar Attitude and Boost their R.Q. (Rockstar Quotient), your team will be treated to one of those rare events – an incredible show that will empower and inspire, while also providing practical, innovative business strategies.

Dennis Brouwer

CEO of The Brouwer Group LLC | Author of "The Return on Leadership" | Expert in Leadership & Team Building | Navy Veteran & Innovation Specialist

Dennis Brouwer is the CEO of The Brouwer Group, LLC, a firm that helps companies achieve peak performance by getting crystal clear on their value proposition, promoting creative leadership behaviors and energizing high-performing teams. He is a former Navy Flight Officer, Mission Commander and Award-winning tactician who started his career as a naval flight officer hunting for Soviet submarines in the north Arabian Sea.

Connie Podesta

Human Behavior Expert | Hall of Fame Speaker | Award-Winning Author | Authority on Leadership, Sales & Personal Development

Connie Podesta is a renowned human behavior expert, Hall of Fame keynote speaker, and award-winning author. With over 30 years of experience, she has empowered millions through her engaging presentations on leadership, sales, and personal development. Known for her humor and insightful approach, Connie helps audiences understand and navigate complex human dynamics to achieve success.

Robyn Benincasa

Top Leadership & Teamwork Motivational Speaker, Full-Time Firefighter, Adventure Racing World Champion, CNN Hero, Best-Selling Author

Robyn Benincasa is a top motivational speaker on leadership, adventure racing world champion, CNN Hero, founder of Project Athena, and bestselling author. She won two World Adventure Races and holds three Guinness World Records for long-distance kayaking. Her book on teamwork and leadership, How Winning Works, is a New York Times bestseller. Her entertaining keynotes show audiences the foundations of inspired leadership and how to win as a team.
